about.name: Jubin Raj Nirmal
about.title: Software Engineer & QA Developer
about.summary: Detail-oriented software engineer with a Master's in Information Security, currently expanding focus in Quality Assurance and Testing. With a strong foundation in IT operations and systems administration, applies analytical problem solving, process awareness, and a security-focused mindset to QA projects. Currently upskilling in manual testing and pursuing ISTQB certification.

highlights: Applied ISTQB standard testing concepts to create artifacts including test plans, test cases, defect reports and test closure documents
Practiced structured manual testing approaches aligned with project quality goals
Built test automation frameworks using Java, Selenium, and Cucumber (BDD/TDD) with Page Object Model design
Managed regression testing using Jenkins and Github and validated APIs using Postman and RestAssured to support CI/CD pipeline integration
Utilized Agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban) and IT Service Management practices in ServiceNow
Administered Unix/Linux systems using commands and shell scripting to automate tasks
Used Python scripting for automation and to interface with AI through API calls to LLMs like GPT
Managed Active Directory accounts and automated policy enforcement using PowerShell and Group Policy Objects
Provisioned and managed Azure compute, storage, and network resources with built-in monitoring and logging
Utilized Terraform for cloud-agnostic infrastructure as code (IaC) automation with Docker containerization
Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and optimized Kubernetes deployments with RBAC and Nginx Ingress Controller
Managed payments, account queries, and disputes while ensuring compliance
Achieved 100% customer satisfaction by resolving issues efficiently using Genesys Cloud and Salesforce CRM
Ensured compliance with call protocols and collaborated across teams to resolve fraud and account-related concerns
Led SOC compliance by developing policies, performing gap analysis, and implementing security controls and logging
Enforced SOC 1 and SOC 2 policies and developed a centralized RBAC logging system to strengthen compliance
Streamlined incident response by co-developing remediation playbooks and managing collaboration through the Notion platform

education.school: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, India

projects.name: Test Automation Framework
projects.description: Comprehensive automation framework using Java, Selenium, and Cucumber with BDD/TDD practices. Integrated with Jenkins for CI/CD pipeline automation and Page Object Model design for maintainable test scripts.

projects.name: Infrastructure as Code Platform
projects.description: Cloud-agnostic infrastructure automation using Terraform with state management, modules, and dynamic blocks. Leveraged Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for orchestration with RBAC implementation.

projects.name: SOC Compliance System
projects.description: Centralized RBAC logging system for SOC 1 and SOC 2 compliance with incident response playbooks and automated gap analysis. Enhanced audit readiness and streamlined security operations.

certifications.name: Migrate SQL workloads to Azure SQL Database
